<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mask of Power](/Feats.aspx?ID=2417) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 50 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Warmask](/Feats.aspx?ID=2415)

</column>

---

Your _warmask_ sharpens your connection to the source of your mask's power. During your daily preparations, choose [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [_phantom pain_](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), or [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345). Until your next daily preparations, you can cast this spell as a 1st-level innate spell once per day; the spell's tradition is determined by the tradition tied to your _warmask_. You must be wearing your _warmask_ to Cast the Spell.
name: Mask of Power
